original: 3.3.6. Atītānāgatavāra🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānittha so sotāyatanaṁ parijānissatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhāyatanam parijānittha so sotāyatanam parijānissati iti no
translated: … The past and future section🔽Has anyone who has fully understood the eye-sphere also fully understood the ear-sphere? No.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam parijānissati saḥ cakkha āyatanam parijānittha ati no
translated: Or has anyone who will fully understand the ear-sphere also fully understood the eye-sphere? No.

original: Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānittha so sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissatīti?🔽Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānittha, no ca sotāyatanaṁ na🔽parijānissanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanañca
analyzed: yaḥ cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha so sotāyatanam na parijānissati iti  ye maggam paṭilabhissanti te cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha no ca sotāyatanam na  parijānissanti agga magga samaṅgī ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te cakkha āyatanañca
translated: Has anyone who has not fully understood the eye-sphere also not fully understood the ear-sphere?

analyzed: na parijānittha sotāyatanam ca na parijānissanti
translated: Those who will obtain the path have not fully understood the eye-sphere, but they have not also not fully understood the ear-sphere. Those who are provided with the foremost path and ordinary people who will not obtain the path have not fully understood the eye-sphere and have not also not fully understood the ear-sphere.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissati so cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam na parijānissati saḥ cakkhu āyatanam na parijānittha ati
translated: Or has anyone who has not fully understood the ear-sphere also not fully understood the eye-sphere?

original: Arahā sotāyatanaṁ na parijānissati, no ca cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānittha. Aggamaggasamaṅgī
analyzed: arahā sotāyatanam na parijānissati no ca cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha agga magga samaṅgī
translated: A perfected one has not fully understood the ear-sphere, but he has not also not fully understood the eye-sphere. Those provided with the foremost path

original: ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanañca na parijānissanti cakkhāyatanañca na parijānittha.
analyzed: ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te sotāyatanam ca na parijānissanti cakkhāyatanam ca na parijānittha
translated: And those ordinary people who do not obtain the path will not fully understand the ear sense-sphere, and they have not fully understood the eye sense-sphere.
The chapter on the planes and the sections is finished.
